short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Page Commenter is the easy way to manage comments on a web page with your clients or team mates

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Page Commenter lets you comment any page or text in the browser.
Save your time and efforts. Surf the web, comment and share the typed text and the screenshot of the page with just one click.
You can share a private link with your client and receive his detailed comments. You can forward this to your team adding your own specifications.
Are you surfing and want to comment a text or image with a friend? Page Commenter to comment it!
Keep shared comments and collects them for future reference with your account!

-----------------------

Page Commenter post to a specified address these fields:

- x : the user account token
- k : the kind of the message
	+ kC : Comment
	+ kB : Bug
	+ kF : new feature request
	+ kL : I Like it
	+ kH : I hate it
- m : the message 
- t : json array of tags
- u : the url of the commented page
- i : the screenshot of the commented page
- w : the width of the screen resolution 
- h : the height of the screen resolution
